subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: Marco Scutaro, 36, the Giants’ late-blooming second baseman, has been so good since he was acquired in a midseason trade that his teammates call him Blockbuster.
snippet: Marco Scutaro, 36, the Giants’ late-blooming second baseman, has been so good since he was acquired in a midseason trade that his teammates call him Blockbuster.
